summary.span: 用作自定义 ASP.NET Web 部件控件的基类，为 基类功能添加了一些附加用户界面 (UI) 属性、创建连接的能力和个性化行为。

span.span: Serves as the base class for custom ASP.NET Web Parts controls, adding to the base class features some additional user interface (UI) properties, the ability to create connections, and personalization behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 Web 部件的功能创建控件时，您有两个基本选项。When you create controls with Web Parts functionality, you have two basic options. 您可以创建自定义控件派生自类，也可以创建或使用其他服务器控件。You can create custom controls that derive from the class, or you can create or use other server controls. 现有的 ASP.NET 控件、 自定义服务器控件和用户控件所有只能获取完整的 Web 部件功能通过声明它们中 （或将它们添加到以编程方式）区域控件，它们将包装与结果在运行时对象，并视为 true控件。Existing ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls can all be given full Web Parts functionality by declaring them within (or adding them programmatically to) a zone control, with the result that they will be wrapped with objects at run time and treated as true controls. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档类。For details, see the documentation for the class. 有关开发的速度和最大限度重用代码，使用现有服务器控件可以是一个不错的选择。For speed of development and maximum reuse of code, using existing server controls can be a good option. 最大以编程方式控制的行为和 Web 部件控件的功能，请创建一个自定义控件继承自类通常是最佳选择。For maximum programmatic control over the behavior and Web Parts functionality of controls, creating a custom control that inherits from the class is often the best option. 抽象类继承自基类控件并提供所有的基本元素控件。The abstract class inherits from the base control and provides the basic elements for all controls. 类包含一组通用的会影响 UI 的外观的属性。The class includes a common set of properties that affect the appearance of the UI. ， ， ， ， ，并每个属性指定是否允许 Web 应用程序的用户与给定属性中指示的方法中的部件控件进行交互名称。The , , , , , and properties each specify whether the user of a Web application is permitted to interact with the part control in the way indicated by the given property name. ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性确定大小，可见性外观和内容 （如标题和说明） 支持用于控件。The , , , , , , , , , , and properties determine the size, visibility, appearance, and supporting content (such as a title and a description) for a control. 之间的关系控制到 Web 部件控件集如由属性在其上下文，它保存到该控件的引用的关联对象，和，引用包含控件。The relationship of a control to its context within the Web Parts control set is determined by properties such as , which holds a reference to the control's associated object, and , which references the that contains the control. 可能只有一个每页、 控制和每个实例控件可以驻留在只有一个一次。There can be only one control per page, and each instance of a control can reside within only one at a time. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件可以放置在网页上，区域之外，但在这种情况下函数作为正常的服务器控件和丢失了几乎所有 Web 部件的功能。A control can be placed outside of a zone on a Web page, but in this case it functions as a normal server control and loses nearly all Web Parts functionality. 其他几个重要属性会影响的唯一功能控件。Several other important properties affect unique features of controls. 属性允许开发人员设置可以用作筛选器在运行时以确定是否将控件添加到页面的任意字符串。The property allows developers to set an arbitrary string that can be used as a filter at run time to determine whether a control is added to the page. 与角色管理等功能结合使用，属性提供了用于创建基于定义的用户角色的视图的有用机制。Used together with a feature such as role management, the property provides a useful mechanism for creating views based on defined user roles. 属性指示是否在导出期间，在控件上的所有可用的属性数据导出，或仅非敏感数据。The property indicates whether, during an export, all the available property data on a control is exported, or only the non-sensitive data. 这允许开发人员能够区分是敏感的数据和非，出于安全方面的数据。This allows developers to distinguish between data that is sensitive and data that is not, for security purposes. 属性返回的实例的引用控件，以便控制当页面处于编辑模式时可以编辑它。The property returns a reference to an instance of a control, so that an control can edit it when the page is in edit mode. 最后，有几个属性，指示相对于网页的其余内容控件的状态。Finally, there are several properties that indicate the status of the control relative to the rest of the page. 属性指示控件是否已关闭 (并因此添加到对象)，或如果它是开放并可在页面。The property indicates whether a control is closed (and thus added to a object), or if it is open and available on the page. 属性指示控件是否为共享的控件 （而不是特定于用户的控件），这意味着它对 Web 页的所有用户可见。The property indicates whether a control is a shared control (versus a user-specific control), meaning that it is visible to all users of a Web page. 属性指示控件当前是否包含在-派生的区域 (如)。The property indicates whether a control is currently contained in a -derived zone (such as ). 值为`false`指示控件是在某个区域中，因此具有完整 Web 部件的功能。A value of `false` indicates the control is inside a zone and thus has full Web Parts functionality. 属性指示控件是否为静态或动态。The property indicates whether a control is static or dynamic. 而以编程方式添加动态控制，Web 页上，在标记中声明了静态控件。A static control is declared in the markup of a Web page, whereas a dynamic control is added programmatically. 类还提供了确定在控件的生命周期中的操作的不同位置的几种方法。The class also provides several methods that determine what happens at various points in the control's life cycle. 例如，和方法可以同时重写派生类提供以编程方式控制的呈现控件的内容与每个方法的名称相对应的事件执行过程中。For example, the and methods can both be overridden in a derived class to provide programmatic control over the rendering of a control's contents during the event that corresponds to each method's name. 派生的类可以添加对象添加到集合。Classes that derive from can add objects to the collection. 在谓词菜单中，将出现在标题栏的呈现谓词控件。The verbs are rendered in a verbs menu, which appears in the title bar of a control. 对象提供常见的用户操作，如隐藏或最小化控件或显示帮助的简单用户界面元素。 objects provide simple UI elements for common user actions such as hiding or minimizing the control or displaying Help. 方法创建的任何自定义集合与关联的控件控件。The method creates a collection of any custom controls that are associated with a control. 开发人员可以替代此方法，使其创建专门用于编辑的自定义控件及其控件。Developers can override this method so that it creates custom controls designed specifically to edit their control. 当用户单击编辑谓词时调用该方法控件。The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件并在网页中引用它。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and reference it in a Web page. 该示例的第一个部分包含自定义代码名为控件`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件演示了如何创建简单的自定义控制有权使用的功能的 Web 部件控件集。This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您的源代码编译为程序集、 将其放在 Web 应用程序，Bin 子文件夹和引用程序集`Register`指令在网页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，其中的各种很多属性可以以声明方式分配给自定义控件。Notice that many of the various properties can be assigned declaratively to the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textwebpartvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化默认值为面向 UI 的多个属性，包括各种`Allow`确定控件的功能的属性。The constructor initializes default values for several UI-oriented properties, including the various `Allow` properties that determine the control's capabilities. 这些属性然后合并到继承的类实例。These properties are then incorporated into an inherited class instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的控件类继承基类中设置的默认属性值构造函数，但然后将更改派生的控件的构造函数中的一个属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how a control that derives from the class inherits the default property values set in the base constructor, but then changes the value of one property in the constructor of the derived control. 此示例中的第一个部分包含自定义代码名为控件`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件演示了如何创建简单的自定义控制有权使用的功能的 Web 部件控件集。This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set. 请注意，在自定义控件的构造函数`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose`属性设置为`false`，其效果的阻止用户关闭网页上的控件。Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您的源代码编译为程序集、 将其放在 Web 应用程序，Bin 子文件夹和引用程序集`Register`指令在网页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 如果您单击的自定义标题栏中的谓词菜单加载在浏览器的页面后现已禁用控件，关闭谓词，这样可以防止用户关闭该控件。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the verbs menu in the title bar of the custom control, the close verb is now disabled, which prevents users from closing the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textwebpartvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户关闭后控件在网页上，控件不再是可见还是该页上提供。After a user closes a control on a Web page, the control is no longer visible or available on the page. 已关闭的控件添加到页目录中，存储对控件的引用的 Web 部件实体。The closed control is added to the page catalog, a Web Parts entity that stores a reference to the control. 如果开发人员添加了到内的页面的控件控件，用户就能够将页面切换到目录显示模式，在页目录中，选择已关闭的控件并将其添加回页面。If a developer adds a control to the page within a control, users are able to switch the page to catalog display mode, select the closed control in the page catalog, and add it back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 已关闭控件可以重新添加到一个页面，以编程方式或通过从页目录中选择已关闭的控件，当页面在目录中的用户显示模式。A closed control can be added back to a page either programmatically, or by a user who selects the closed control from the page catalog when the page is in catalog display mode. 关闭控件是不同于删除它。Closing a control is different from deleting it. 永久删除已删除的控件时，可以返回到页上，添加已关闭的控件。A closed control can be added back to a page, while a deleted control is permanently removed. 删除控件的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information on deleting controls, see the method. 关闭控件也是不同于隐藏的。Closing a control is also different from hiding it. 控件隐藏的是，但仍会出现在页上，它仍参与页面生命周期事件，并只会隐藏从用户的视图中，已关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页面上。A control that is hidden is still present on the page, still participates in page life cycle events, and is only hidden from the user's view, but a closed control is not even rendered on a page. 静态和动态可以关闭声明的控件 （静态控件是在页面的标记中，动态控件以编程方式添加时）。Both static and dynamic controls (static controls are declared in a page's markup, while dynamic controls are added programmatically) can be closed. 如果开发人员设置属性设置为`false`关闭谓词未显示在控件中，用户不能关闭该控件。If a developer sets the property to `false`, a close verb does not appear on the control, and the user is not able to close the control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的自定义的属性控制，以便它不能关闭。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom control, so that it cannot be closed. 此示例中的第一个部分包含自定义代码名为控件`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 请注意，在自定义控件的构造函数`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose`属性设置为`false`，其效果的阻止用户关闭网页上的控件。Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page. 这意味着，将对用户禁用控件的谓词菜单上的关闭谓词。This means that the close verb on the verbs menu of the control will be disabled for users. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您的源代码编译为程序集、 将其放在 Web 应用程序，Bin 子文件夹和引用程序集`Register`指令在网页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，在``引用该控件的元素，您也可以更改控件的构造函数设置的属性的值。Note that in the `` element that references the control, you could also change the value of the property set by the control's constructor. 若要允许控件即将关闭，只需添加`AllowClose="true"`声明性标记中元素的属性。To allow the control to be closed, simply add an `AllowClose="true"` attribute to the element in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要允许最终用户能够编辑控件，属性必须设置为`true`（默认值），并且页面的显示模式必须是处于编辑模式。To allow end users to edit a control, the property must be set to `true` (the default), and the page's display mode must be in edit mode. 显示模式中的字段由表示控件。Display modes are represented by fields in the control. 在这种情况下，模式是。In this case, the mode is . 有关详细信息页显示模式和如何更改它们，请参阅类概述。For details about page display modes and how to change them, see the class overview. 当属性设置为`false`编辑选项以声明方式或以编程方式，将受到限制。When the property is set to `false` either declaratively or programmatically, editing options are limited. 可能的编辑操作仅对页面的布局更改，使用控件或通过自定义启用其他基本操作控件。The only possible editing operations are changes to the page's layout, using a control, or other basic operations enabled through custom controls. 有关使用示例控件从 Web 部件控件集，并演示如何启用编辑的自定义 Web 部件控件，请参阅[演练： 创建 Web 部件页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770)。For an example that uses controls from the Web Parts control set and shows how to enable editing of a custom Web Parts control, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770). > [!IMPORTANT] > 效果的属性对控件的行为还受 Web 页的当前个性化设置范围和单独的 Web 部件控件在该页上。The effect that the property has on a control's behavior is also impacted by the current personalization scope of the Web page, and the individual Web Parts controls on that page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的的 Web 部件的属性控制，以使控件不能进行编辑。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be edited. 此示例假定使用控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。This example assumes the use of a control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 该用户控件引用通过`Register`指令承载用户控件的网页的顶部附近。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在网页上，在声明性标记上``元素，它引用该控件，请注意`AllowEdit="false"`属性。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowEdit="false"` attribute. 尽管`true`是默认情况下，该属性已设置为`false`对于此示例的目的。Although `true` is the default, the attribute has been set to `false` for the purposes of this example. 加载页面在浏览器，并使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，若要更改编辑模式下的显示模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Modes** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode. 接下来，单击标题栏中的谓词菜单控件，并请注意，编辑谓词是缺失，因为禁用编辑控件上。Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the control, and note that the edit verb is missing, because you disabled editing on the control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许最终用户隐藏 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users are allowed to hide a control.

value.span: 如果可以隐藏 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can be hidden; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定用户是否可以修改属性。The property determines whether users can modify the property. 默认情况下，当属性值为`true`，所编辑的控件时，用户可以更改的值。In the default case, when the property value is `true`, users can change the value when the control is being edited. 默认情况下不隐藏控件及其属性值是`false`。By default, controls are not hidden and their property value is `false`. 当所编辑的控件，如果用户选择一个复选框以隐藏控件 (集属性设置为`true`)，该控件将不再可见时将页返回到浏览模式。When a control is being edited, if a user selects a check box to hide the control (which sets the property to `true`), the control will no longer be visible when the page returns to browse mode. 隐藏的控件是从已关闭的控件不同，因为属性具有 Web 部件控件集内不同的含义。Hidden controls are distinct from controls that are closed, because the property has a distinct meaning within the Web Parts control set. 已关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页上，并不参与页面生命周期事件。Closed controls are not even rendered on a page, and do not participate in page life cycle events. 与之相反，而隐藏控件不是对用户可见，它们仍在网页上呈现，仍包含在区域中，并仍保持与其他连接Web 部件应用程序的一部分的控件。In contrast, while hidden controls are not visible to users, they are still rendered on a Web page, are still contained in a zone, and can still maintain connections with other controls as part of a Web Parts application. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的属性的自定义 Web 部件控件，因此，不能由用户隐藏自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the custom control cannot be hidden by a user. 此示例假定使用自定义控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 该用户控件引用通过`Register`指令承载用户控件的网页的顶部附近。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在网页上，在声明性标记上``元素，它引用该控件，请注意`AllowHide="false"`属性，可以阻止无法隐藏该控件编辑的用户。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowHide="false"` attribute, which prevents a user who is editing the control from being able to hide it. 加载页面在浏览器，并使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，若要更改编辑模式下的显示模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode. 接下来，单击标题栏中的谓词菜单控件，然后单击编辑谓词。Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the control and click the edit verb. 在显示编辑用户界面 (UI)，您可以看到 UI 以编辑现已禁用属性，原因在于您设置属性值设置为`false`。As the edit user interface (UI) is displayed, you can see that the UI to edit the property is now disabled, which occurred because you set the property value to `false`. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/CS/allowhidecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/VB/allowhidevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以最小化 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users can minimize a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，如果设置为`false`，防止最终用户能够最小化控件，以及用户界面 (UI) 的最小化控件不显示在控件的标题栏中。The property, if set to `false`, prevents an end user from being able to minimize the control, and the user interface (UI) for minimizing the control does not appear in the control's title bar. 在 Web 部件术语中，当属性设置为`false`上控件的谓词菜单, 未出现的最小化谓词。In Web Parts terminology, when the property is set to `false`, the minimize verb does not appear on the control's verbs menu. 当用户最小化控件时，它减少了下一个最小区域，仅显示部分的控件的标题栏和标题的控件的大小。When a user minimizes a control, it reduces the control's size down to a minimal area that displays only part of the control's title bar and title. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的属性的自定义 Web 部件控件，以便该控件不能最小化的用户。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be minimized by a user. 此示例假定使用自定义控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在网页上，在声明性标记上``元素，它引用该控件，注意`AllowMinimize="false"`属性，它会隐藏中的最小化谓词控件的谓词菜单中，并防止用户都无法提供最小化控件。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowMinimize="false"` attribute, which hides the minimize verb in the control's verbs menu, and prevents a user from being able to minimize the control. 浏览器中加载的页面，然后单击谓词菜单控件。Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the control. 最小化谓词，它通常会出现的谓词菜单上，因为禁用该控件声明性标记中隐藏。The minimize verb, which would normally be present on the verbs menu, is hidden because you disabled it in the declarative markup for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize/CS/allowminimizecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize/VB/allowminimizevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，和 Web 页处于允许布局更改 （如编辑或设计模式） 的显示模式下时，用户可以通过将控件移到另一个更改页面布局页面上的区域。When the property is `true`, and a Web page is in a display mode that allows layout changes (such as edit or design mode), a user can change the page layout by moving a control to another zone on the page. 如果该属性设置为`false`，控件不能在区域之间移动，但仍可以在其当前的区域内移动。If the property is set to `false`, a control cannot be moved between zones, but can still be moved within its current zone. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改默认设置的属性的自定义 Web 部件控件，以便最终用户不能将控件移至另一个区域。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that an end user cannot move the control to a different zone. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 该用户控件引用通过`Register`指令承载用户控件的网页的顶部附近。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性控制，以便与控件目录中的控件显示图像。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property for a control, so that an image appears with the control in a catalog of controls. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`中的示例部分创建类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件，使用户能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 该用户控件引用通过`Register`指令承载用户控件的网页的顶部附近。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). property's source code. 有关详细信息，请参见。For details, see . > [!NOTE] > 若要启用你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中包含 Web 部件控件的 Web 应用程序的导出功能，必须将添加到属性``元素内的``部分中的，如以下标记所示。To enable the export feature for a Web application that includes Web Parts controls, in the Web.config file for your application, you must add an attribute to the `` element within the `` section, as in the following markup. > > `` > > `` 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，对于导出的代码示例正常工作，您还必须更新您的 Web.config 文件通过将属性添加`enableExport="true"`到``元素，如备注节中所述。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file by adding the attribute `enableExport="true"` to the `` element, as indicated in the Remarks section. 此示例中的第一个部分包含一个名为控件的代码`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件是自定义控件中的示例部分找到的相同类的概述，只不过它将添加`Personalizable`属性为`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性，以便可导出的属性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it adds a `Personalizable` attribute to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 请注意，特性声明中包含的值`true`为`isSensitive`参数，这意味着该属性标记为敏感数据导出目的。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您的源代码编译为程序集、 将其放在 Web 应用程序，Bin 子文件夹和引用程序集`Register`指令在网页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet Explorer 呈现模式可能会影响的高度控件和包含该区域的高度。Internet Explorer rendering modes can affect the height of a control and the height of the zone that contains it. 在兼容模式下 （与早期浏览器版本的向后兼容） 或在标准模式下，Internet Explorer 呈现网页 (由是否存在`DOCTYPE`页中的声明)。Internet Explorer renders Web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions) or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 有关这些模式的信息，请参阅 DHTML[仍然可以](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)属性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 当 Internet Explorer 呈现在标准模式下的页面时，在某些情况下它可能不会调整大小单元格在表中，即使单元格的 HTML 标记为``。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, under some circumstances it might not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 因此， ，使控件不会拉伸该区域的最大高度为呈现控件和其包含的区域。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 在标准模式下 Internet Explorer 时，控件不呈现其拉伸到其完整的高度，以在以下情况下：When Internet Explorer is in standard mode, controls do not render to stretch to their full height in the following cases: - 当一个区域属性设置为且在该区域上显式设置的高度。When a zone's property is set to and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，不要指定水平方向的区域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontally oriented zone. - 当一个区域属性设置为并且未显式设置的区域或所包含的控件的高度。When a zone's property is set to and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone or of the contained controls. 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，垂直方向的区域中设置的区域或控件的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertically oriented zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何呈现的问题影响的高度中的控件。The following code example demonstrates the rendering issue that affects the height of controls in a . 为了演示此问题，必须在 Internet Explorer 中运行页。To demonstrate this issue, you must run the page in Internet Explorer. 请注意该区域的方向将设置为水平，并且未显式设置的区域和其中的控件的高度。Note that the zone's orientation is set to horizontal, and that the height of the zone and the controls within it is not set explicitly. 结果是，在越短，控件不会拉伸到在呈现时该区域的高度。The result is that in the , the shorter control does not stretch to the height of the zone upon rendering. 但是，如果您删除`DOCTYPE`声明从页上，然后运行页上再次，不会不会出现此问题，因为现在在浏览器不会呈现在标准模式下的页。However, if you remove the `DOCTYPE` declaration from the page and run the page again, the issue does not occur, because now the browser will not render the page in standards mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Height#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Height/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Height#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Height/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 若要查看 （在备注部分中描述） 的解决方法的工作原理，请尝试添加`height`归于``元素，在保持`DOCTYPE`页中的声明。To see how the workaround (described in the Remarks section) works, try adding a `height` attribute to the `` element, while keeping the `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page. 下面的代码可用于将属性添加到该标记：You can use the following code to add the attribute to the tag: `Height="200px"` 运行页上，且现在两控件都将拉伸以填充区域的显式声明的高度。Run the page, and now both controls stretch to fill the explicitly declared height of the zone. 您还可以尝试使用此代码示例，以观察在其他方案中，就会发生此高度相关的呈现问题时的区域设置为。You can also experiment with this code example to observe the height-related rendering issue in the other scenario, which occurs when the zone's is set to . 删除现有`LayoutOrientation`属性和其值从``元素，它将导致该区域的方向，若要还原到默认的垂直方向。Remove the existing `LayoutOrientation` attribute and its value from the `` element, which will cause the zone's orientation to revert to the default vertical orientation. 上设置高度特性``元素为 200 像素，为您做更高版本，并运行该页面。Set the height attribute on the `` element to 200 pixels, as you did above, and run the page. 区域的高度看上去太大，并且控件不按比例调整到区域的高度。The zone's height looks too large, and the controls are not sized proportionately to the zone's height. 现在删除 height 属性，并再次运行此页。Now remove the height attribute and run the page again. 现在，控件将呈现相对于区域的高度。The controls now render relative to the height of the zone.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性来确定浏览器显示的控件的帮助内容的方式。Use the property to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control. 下表列出了在浏览器上的各种帮助模式影响的帮助内容时显示控件。The following table lists the effects of the various Help modes on a browser when Help content for a control is displayed. |帮助模式Help mode|浏览器行为Browser behavior| |---------------|----------------------| ||打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability. 用户在返回到 Web 部件页之前必须关闭该窗口。A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.| ||打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability. 用户在返回到网页之前无需关闭该窗口。A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.| ||替换浏览器窗口中的“Web 部件”页。Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性来显示相同的浏览器窗口中的控件有关的帮助。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display Help for a control in the same browser window. 此示例中的第一部分都假定使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。The first part of this example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例还包括一个包含虚构的帮助内容的 HTML 页面`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The code example also includes an HTML page that contains fictitious Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 对于此示例正常工作，必须将以下代码保存在一个名为 Textwebparthelp.htm 文件并将其放在你的网站与.aspx 页相同的目录。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 该示例的最后一部分是演示如何引用一个网页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The final part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 请注意，在声明性标记属性值设置为，此代码还设置的值和属性设置为包含帮助内容的 HTML 文件的名称。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to , and the code also sets the value of the property to the name of the HTML file that contains the Help content. 页加载到浏览器中，并单击上的谓词菜单的帮助谓词控件。Load the page into a browser, and click the help verb on the verbs menu of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个隐藏仍保留在其区域中，控件实际上呈现在页上，并参与页生命周期阶段如`PreRender`阶段，即使它不是在浏览器中可见。A control that is hidden remains in its zone, is actually rendered on its page, and participates in page life cycle phases such as the `PreRender` phase, even though it is not visible in a browser. 这是不同于都将关闭，因为已关闭的控件不会甚至呈现在页上，而隐藏的控件是呈现和 Web 部件应用程序中处于活动状态，但对用户不可见的控件。This is different from controls that are closed, because closed controls are not even rendered on a page, while hidden controls are rendered and active in Web Parts applications, though not visible to users. Web 部件控件集隐藏通过将其级联样式表 (CSS) 样式设置的值为控制`display:none`。The Web Parts control set hides the control by setting its cascading style sheet (CSS) style to a value of `display:none`. 即使控件的属性设置为`true`，如果在页上的当前显示模式允许隐藏的控件要显示仍显示该控件。Even if the property for a control is set to `true`, the control is still displayed if the current display mode on the page allows hidden controls to be displayed. 例如，编辑模式允许隐藏的控件来显示，以便用户可以编辑它们。For example, edit mode allows hidden controls to be displayed, so that users can edit them. 隐藏的控件特定显示模式中可见时，控件的标题将显示一个字符串，指示控件处于隐藏状态。When hidden controls are visible in certain display modes, the title of the control displays a string indicating that the control is in hidden status. 当上的属性控件设置为`false`，即默认值，在页面上显示控件。When the property on a control is set to `false`, which is the default, the control is displayed on the page. 请注意，如果属性设置为`false`，最终用户不能编辑属性值。Note that if the property is set to `false`, end users are not allowed to edit the property value. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性的自定义 Web 部件控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property for a custom Web Parts control. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的示例部分中找到类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，在网页中的声明性标记``元素中，`Hidden`属性值设置为`true`。Notice that in the Web page, in the declarative markup for the `` element, the `Hidden` attribute value is set to `true`. `TextDisplayWebPart`如果浏览器中加载页面的控件将不会出现。The `TextDisplayWebPart` control will not appear if the page is loaded in a browser. 但是，该控件是在页上，在其区域中，仍然存在，它仍可以参与连接与其他控制是否创建这些连接。However, the control is still present on the page and in its zone, and it still could participate in connections with other controls if you created those connections. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Hidden#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Hidden/CS/hiddencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Hidden#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Hidden/VB/hiddenvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置当用户尝试部件控件的描述文件导入到 Web 部件控件目录时出错时显示的自定义错误消息。The property allows you to set a custom error message that is displayed if an error occurs when a user tries to import a part control's description file into a catalog of Web Parts controls. 可以以声明方式在设置属性控件，添加`ImportErrorMessage`控件并将错误消息字符串分配给它的开始标记中的属性。You can set the property declaratively on a control, adding the `ImportErrorMessage` attribute within the opening tag of the control and assigning an error message string to it. 此外可以以编程方式设置的属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. 有关完整代码示例演示如何同时导出和导入。Web 部件说明文件，以控件，其中包括利用属性，请参阅类。For a full code example that demonstrates both exporting and importing .WebPart description files for controls, which includes use of the property, see the class. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为，并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享的 Web 部件控件是对 Web 页的所有用户可见。A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page. 与相对的共享控制是每个用户控件，这是特定于用户，仅对该控件添加到页的用户可见。The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to a page. 如果用户在共享的个性化设置范围内查看页面时添加的动态控件，则将共享控件。If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared. 如果用户处于用户个性化设置范围时将该控件添加为该控件的属性值将为`false`。If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the property value for that control will be `false`. 有关详细信息共享和每个用户控件，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性的自定义 Web 部件控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property for a custom Web Parts control. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`中的示例部分创建类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 当加载网页在浏览器，并单击**检查共享**按钮，代码将检查上的属性`TextDisplayWebPart`控制和属性的值是`true`，因为该控件引用为静态控件中页的声明性标记。When you load the Web page in a browser and click the **Check Sharing** button, the code checks the property on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and the value of the property is `true`, because the control is referenced as a static control in the declarative markup of the page. summary.span: 设置一个标志，以指示当前 控件实例的个性化数据已更改。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating that personalization data has changed for the current control instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将设置一个标志，指示控件状态数据更改 （个性化） 上控件，并且控件因此需要持久保存到长期存储的个性化设置数据。The method sets a flag indicating that control state data has been changed (personalized) on a control, and that the control therefore needs to persist the personalization data to long term storage. 通常情况下个性化设置更改将永久保存在控件，而无需开发人员能够调用方法。Normally the persists personalization changes on controls without a need for developers to call the method. 但有两种情况下，在其中开发人员需要调用此方法。But there are two cases in which developers do need to call this method. 第一种情况是当控件状态数据更改期间 HTTP`GET`到页面的请求。The first case is when control state data is changed during an HTTP `GET` request to a page. 默认情况下，更改为控件状态数据期间`GET`请求不会保留 （出于安全目的）。By default, changes to control state data during a `GET` request are not persisted (for security purposes). 但方法提供了一种方法可保存到的合法的个性化设置更改控制这种情况下。But the method provides a way to persist legitimate personalization changes to controls in this case. 调用第二个事例方法时发生 HTTP`POST`到页面的请求。The second case for calling the method occurs during an HTTP `POST` request to a page. 如果控件具有可个性化设置的复杂属性 (例如包含的属性对象)，这些属性中的控件状态数据个性化期间`POST`请求，开发人员必须调用若要确保持久保存所做的更改的方法。If a control has complex personalizable properties (such as a property that contains an object), and control state data in those properties is personalized during a `POST` request, developers must call the method to ensure that the changes are persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，可以选择要在您的自定义中返回的标准副标题字符串将追加到该控件的标题的控件。Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string in your custom control that will be appended to the control's title. 如果提供的值中自定义属性控制，Web 部件控件集自动将其追加到的值属性来创建控件的完整标题。If you provide a value for the property in a custom control, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the property to create a complete title for the control. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供副标题的自定义实例控件。The following code example demonstrates how to provide a subtitle for instances of a custom control. 此示例中的第一个部分包含一个名为的自定义控件的代码`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件是自定义控件中的示例部分找到相同类的概述，不同之处在于它还重写属性以提供包含虚构的公司名称的标准副标题的实例自定义控件。This control is the same as the custom control which is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it also overrides the property to provide a standard subtitle containing a fictitious company name for instances of the custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您的源代码编译为程序集、 将其放在 Web 应用程序，Bin 子文件夹和引用程序集`Register`指令在网页中。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分是演示如何引用一个网页`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 网页中的控件。The second part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 加载浏览器中的页面后，该控件的标题栏文本包括分配给声明性标记、 连字符分隔符和从自定义子标题的值中的控件的标题`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。After you load the page in a browser, the control's title bar text includes the title assigned to the control in the declarative markup, a hyphen separator, and the value of the custom subtitle from the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/CS/subtitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/VB/subtitlevb.aspx#1)]

To supply a subtitle for instances of a custom control, you must override the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置部件控件的标题。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果开发人员将一个值赋给属性，则此值确定所有 （或至少部分） 中控件的标题栏的文本。If a developer assigns a value to the property, then that value determines all (or at least part of) the text in the control's title bar. 标题文本也显示为工具提示文本的一部分时将鼠标指针放的标题栏控件或其他服务器控件中显示的区域。The title text also appears as part of the ToolTip text when you position your mouse pointer over the title bar of a control or other server control that appears in a zone. 控件的标题栏中显示的完整文本也受属性。The complete text displayed in a control's title bar is also affected by the property. 如果该属性具有分配给它的值，则该值串联到标题。If that property has a value assigned to it, the value is concatenated to the title. 如果没有值分配给显示属性，计算出的标题。If no value is assigned to the property, a calculated title is displayed. 开发人员可以在任何时刻，检索实际、 总计中所显示的文本通过获取的值的控件的标题栏属性。At any point, developers can retrieve the actual, total text displayed in a control's title bar by getting the value of the property. 标题文本的样式由属性包含部件控件的区域。The style of the title text is determined by the property of the zone that contains the part control. 有关代码示例演示如何使用基属性，请参阅属性。For a code example that demonstrates the use of the base property, see the property.

summary.span: 获取与 控件关联的自定义谓词的集合。

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词派生自类，并提供用户界面 (UI) 操作，用户可对执行控件。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常为按钮、 链接或菜单项在 UI 中表示谓词。Usually verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 默认情况下，常见的 Web 部件谓词出现在每个中的下拉谓词菜单控件的标题栏。By default, common Web Parts verbs appear on a drop-down verbs menu in each control's title bar. 有标准谓词用于打开、 关闭、 编辑和最小化控件，并用于导出的定义控件或加载帮助文件的其他谓词。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 中不包括这些谓词集合，因为该集合包含谓词仅自定义创建并返回通过重写此属性在派生类中的。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs that you create and return by overriding this property in a derived class. 当创建自定义谓词并将其添加到集合，然后，您可以访问的谓词以编程方式从控件。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性的自定义 Web 部件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property for a custom Web Parts control. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`中的示例部分创建类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，若要运行代码示例，必须添加的设置在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件说明文件中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保您有 Web 页所在的目录中为此代码示例的 Web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 内``部分中，请确保有``具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如以下标记。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 加载浏览器中的网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 当您单击**显示谓词计数**按钮，它将访问属性以获取自定义谓词的数`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，并在标签中显示的计数。When you click the **Display Verb Count** button, it accesses the property to get the count of custom verbs for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and displays the count in a label. 因为没有自定义的谓词已添加到该控件在这种情况下，此计数为零。Because no custom verbs have been added to the control in this case, the count is zero. remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件页始终具有的单个实例控件。A Web Parts page always has a single instance of a control. 控制跟踪和管理在页上，包括从基类派生的所有区域的所有 Web 部件控件类和派生自基类的所有部件控件类。The control tracks and manages all the other Web Parts controls on a page, including all zones that derive from the base class, and all part controls that derive from the base class. 存在属性，以便每个可以与关联控件及其控件。The property exists so that every control can be associated with its control. 控件，反过来，保持所有的集合中的页上的控件及其集合。The control, in turn, maintains a collection of all the controls on a page in its collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的 Web 部件控件集体系结构，控件可以具有 Web 部件的功能仅当它们的内部运行区域。In the architecture of the Web Parts control set, controls can have Web Parts functionality only if they operate inside of zones. 标准要在网页上使用的区域是控件。The standard zone to use on Web pages is the control. 虽然最终用户可以在网页上的不同区域之间移动 Web 部件控件，控件的给定的实例可以在只有一个区域中驻留一次。Although end users can move Web Parts controls between different zones on a Web page, a given instance of a control can reside in only one zone at a time. Web 部件控件，以及其关联控制，请使用属性来跟踪该区域控件当前位于和区域的常见布局和样式属性将应用于包含的所有 Web 部件控件。A Web Parts control, and its associated control, use the property to keep track of which zone the control currently resides in, and what common layout and style characteristics of the zone apply to all contained Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问和属性自定义的 Web 部件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to access the and properties for a custom Web Parts control. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`中的示例部分创建类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包括让用户能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式的自定义用户控件。The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 该用户控件引用通过`Register`指令承载用户控件的网页的顶部附近。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 有两个``元素在页面上，每个元素表示 Web 部件区域。There are two `` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone. 第一个区域包含一个标准控件，其作用类似控制在运行时，因为它是在某个区域中。The first zone contains a standard control, which acts like a control at run time because it is in a zone. 第二个区域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 当用户单击**区域信息**按钮，`Label1`控件显示的值的控件属性和当前包含该控件的区域的属性。When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the property for the control, and the property of the zone that currently contains the control. summary.span: 获取 控件在其区域内的索引位置。

span.span: Gets the index position of a control within its zone.

value.span: 控件在其区域中的数字顺序。

span.span: The numerical order of a control within its zone.

value.span: 区域中的第一个控件的索引值为零。

span.span: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示其区域中 Web 部件控件的数值顺序 （或序号位置） 相对于该区域中其他控件。The property indicates a Web Parts control's numerical order (or ordinal position) within its zone, relative to other controls in the zone. 控件使用此属性来跟踪和管理其在网页上的 Web 部件控件的集合。The control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你不能假设的值控件的属性将等于同一控件中的索引值控件的区域的集合。You cannot assume that the value of the property for a control will equal the index value for the same control within the collection of the control's zone. 通常的控件在其区域中相对位置 (其值)，并在中的索引添加到和从区域中删除控件时，其区域的集合将为不同的值。Often a control's relative position in its zone (its value), and its index within the collection of its zone, will be different values as controls are added to and removed from zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问和属性自定义的 Web 部件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to access the and properties for a custom Web Parts control. 此示例假设使用一个自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`中的示例部分创建类概述。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 代码示例包括让用户能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式的自定义用户控件。The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 该用户控件引用通过`Register`指令承载用户控件的网页的顶部附近。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 有两个``元素在页面上，每个元素表示 Web 部件区域。There are two `` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone. 第一个区域包含一个标准控件，其作用类似控制在运行时，因为它是在某个区域中。The first zone contains a standard control, which acts like a control at run time because it is in a zone. 第二个区域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 当用户单击**区域信息**按钮，`Label1`控件显示的值的控件属性和当前包含该控件的区域的属性。When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the property for the control, and the property of the zone that currently contains the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/webpartzoneindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/webpartzoneindexvb.aspx#1)]
